name: Dodge Panic
description:
Dodge Panic is the first game I made.

Rules :  Use the left and right arrow keys to avoid the enemies falling from the sky and collect the stars to increase your score!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music : Noah Eichler

SFX : Mattias "Mattix" Lahoud
